NK010(tha)040:0: khros nag bka' srung spyang zhon mched gsum gsol byang dgra bgegs mthar byed bzhugs /
NK010(tha)040:1: gtor ma 'bru gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs nas /
NK010(tha)040:2: h'u dur khrod khrag mtsho me rlung 'khrugs pa'i klong //
NK010(tha)040:3: spyang zhon nag mo gri gug thod khrag 'dzin //
NK010(tha)040:4: stag zhon dmar mo gri gug sprul zhags thogs //
NK010(tha)040:5: 'phar zhon sngon mo gri gug lcags kyu bsnams //
NK010(tha)040:6: las byed pho nya bye ba 'bum gyis bskor //
NK010(tha)040:7: u rgyan smug nag 'khrigs pa'i dur khrod nas //
NK010(tha)040:8: skad cig yud la gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
NK010(tha)040:9: bdud rtsi sman rag gtor ma'i mchod pa bzhes //
NK010(tha)040:10: pad+ma thod phreng dgyes mdzad khros ma yi //
NK010(tha)040:11: bka' bzhin sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor bdag cag gi //
NK010(tha)040:12: 'gal rkyen kun sol mthun rkyen yid bzhin sgrubs //
NK010(tha)040:13: dgra sod bgegs thul bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod //
NK010(tha)040:14: ma b+h+yo dzahm h+aa ba ling+ta kh+aa h+ai /
NK010(tha)040:15: zhes pa'ang 'jam dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rjes rnam rgyal
NK010(tha)040:16: lo'i mgo zla'i tshes gcig la pad+ma bde ldan du
